summary: Much of Venezuela is ungoverned or ill-governed—allowing drug trafficking, illegal gold mining, and other criminal activities to spread to neighboring countries. Corrupt Venezuelans and other criminals use Venezuela's permissive environment to generate illicit income and then move the assets to hide where they came from. U.S. agencies have taken on efforts to disrupt illicit financial transactions, including those related to drug trafficking and other criminal...
title: Venezuela: Illicit Financial Flows and U.S. Efforts to Disrupt Them
